snippet.title: Soviet Soldier Trailer
snippet.description: Join the Red Army in its hour of need against the Germans, and experience its battle against the capitalist west. Make choices that will not only affect the characters around you but the entire world. Fight in historically authentic battles from Berlin to Afghanistan. The fate of the Soviet Union rests in your hands comrade.
